author: snoopdave
msg: Fixes to allow Roller JUnit tests to run against EclipseLink JPA. Most changes involved adding code to manage both ends of a one-to-many, or many-to-one relationships. EclipseLink JPA is picky about this and I guess OpenJPA was not.

Left the EclipseLink stuff in the POMs for now, commented out. Might be nice someday to have different Maven build profiles for the different options, so testing against EclipseLink JPA, Hibernate JPA and OpenJPA can be automated.

author: kkolinko
msg: - SetOutPath creates the empty folders for us. Thus 'File /nonfatal' trick is not needed.
- Simplify deletion patterns in the Uninstall section
